channel.title: unattended on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter

item.title: Automated Upgrade to Veeam v11
item.description: After the release of Veeam Backup & Replication v10 last year, I wrote a PowerShell script to automate the upgrade. It’s as easy as they come as it enabled one-click upgrades of Veeam environments. With the release of v11, I wanted to continue the tradition to enable those with multiple Veeam servers, the easy button for mass upgrades to the latest version of the product. I’m happy to announce the release of an updated version of this script for v11!
